nCorrectorsPIMPLE.title: nCorrectors
nCorrectorsPIMPLE.description: sets the number of times the algorithm solves the pressure equation and momentum corrector in each step

nNonOrthogonalCorrectorsPIMPLE.title: nNonOrthogonalCorrectors
nNonOrthogonalCorrectorsPIMPLE.description: pecifies repeated solutions of the pressure equation, used to update the explicit non-orthogonal correction

nOuterCorrectorsPIMPLE.title: nOuterCorrectors
nOuterCorrectorsPIMPLE.description: it enables looping over the entire system of equations within on time step, representing the total number of times the system is solved

momentumPredictorPIMPLE.title: momentumPredictor
momentumPredictorPIMPLE.description: switch that controls solving of the momentum predictor
